heading: Adam Sandler Quits Comedy
body: Hollywood is famous for a great many films and faces, but none moreso than the orange, flexed, highly paid Adam Sandler. Adam has done almost no other work since 1995, when he began his series of incredibly profitable pictures. Not that the films are successful; they’re not. So you can only imagine the surprise of critics when in February the 50-year-old married father of two announced he was quitting comedy. He’s now going to do an “art film,” he says. That would be the long-mooted comedy called The Waterboy, which has gone into turnaround.
